name: Tartar Sauce
description: A tangy, creamy condiment perfect for fish dishes. Makes more than enough for two servings.
ingredients:
3 tbsp pickles
1 tbsp capers
1 tbsp parsley
1/2 small white onion or shallot
1 cup mayo
1 clove garlic
1/2 tbsp lemon juice
steps:
1. Finely dice pickles, capers, parsley, onion, and garlic.
2. Mix all ingredients together.
3. Taste and adjust: add salt, sugar, more lemon juice, or additional mayo if needed.
